content.raw:
This seems pretty good, though I’m not too sure about the monkey-patching of the DDS instances. I would say one probably ought to subclass DDS and make a PulseBlasterDDS class that implements the functionality, in order to avoid monkeypatching. I don’t believe there is an equivalent of this for the Novatechs, otherwise it would belong in the DDS class.

Other than that I’m happy, the implementation looks straightforward.
